name: Seneca Quote
description: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it. - Seneca

name: Marcus Aurelius Quote
description: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think. - Marcus Aurelius

name: Jack Kornfield Quote
description: The trouble is, you think you have time. - Jack Kornfield

name: Marcus Aurelius Quote 2
description: Do not act as if you had ten thousand years to live. The inescapable is hanging over your head. While you have life in you, while you still can, make yourself good. - Marcus Aurelius

name: Confucius Quote
description: Every man has two lives, and the second starts when he realizes he has just one. - Confucius

name: Benjamin Franklin Quote
description: Do not squander time, for that's the stuff life is made of. - Benjamin Franklin

name: Chinese Proverb Quote
description: Enjoy yourself. It's later than you think. - Chinese proverb

name: Chinese Proverb Quote 2
description: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now. - Chinese proverb

name: Dr. Seuss Quote
description: How did it get so late so soon? - Dr. Seuss

name: Ralph Waldo Emerson Quote
description: It is not length of life, but depth of life. - Ralph Waldo Emerson

name: Seneca Quote 2
description: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life. - Seneca

name: Anonymous Quote
description: You are not guaranteed a tomorrow. Live today. - Anonymous

name: Sarah Louise Delany Quote
description: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet. - Sarah Louise Delany

name: Anonymous Quote 2
description: Our lives are but specks of dust falling through the fingers of time. Like dust, we settle in this place and leave nothing but memories. - Anonymous

name: Marcus Aurelius Quote 3
description: What we do in life echoes in eternity. - Marcus Aurelius

name: Mahatma Gandhi Quote
description: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever. - Mahatma Gandhi

name: Benjamin Franklin Quote 2
description: Lost time is never found again. - Benjamin Franklin

name: Annie Dillard Quote
description: How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives. - Annie Dillard

name: Andy Warhol Quote
description: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself. - Andy Warhol

name: Wayne Dyer Quote
description: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one. - Wayne Dyer

name: Robert Frost Quote
description: The afternoon knows what the morning never suspected. - Robert Frost

name: Muhammad Ali Quote
description: Don't count the days, make the days count. - Muhammad Ali

name: Rose Kennedy Quote
description: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments. - Rose Kennedy

name: Charles Buxton Quote
description: You will never find time for anything. If you want time, you must make it. - Charles Buxton

name: Dick Sharples Quote
description: Death is nature's way of telling you to slow down. - Dick Sharples

name: Theophrastus Quote
description: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend. - Theophrastus

name: Dead Poets Society Quote
description: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary. - Dead Poets Society

name: Paulo Coelho Quote
description: One day you will wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted. Do it now. - Paulo Coelho

name: Mae West Quote
description: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough. - Mae West

name: Robin Sharma Quote
description: Don't live the same year 75 times and call it a life. - Robin Sharma

name: Robert Brault Quote
description: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things. - Robert Brault

name: Ferris Bueller Quote
description: Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it. - Ferris Bueller's Day Off

name: Confucius Quote 2
description: We have two lives, and the second begins when we realize we only have one. - Confucius

name: Nathaniel Hawthorne Quote
description: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind. - Nathaniel Hawthorne

name: Ralph Waldo Emerson Quote 2
description: It is not the length of life, but the depth. - Ralph Waldo Emerson

name: Lao Tzu Quote
description: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides. - Lao Tzu

name: Haruki Murakami Quote
description: Death is not the opposite of life, but a part of it. - Haruki Murakami

name: Tom Hiddleston Quote
description: We all have two lives. The second begins the moment we realize we have only one. - Tom Hiddleston

name: Marcus Aurelius Quote 4
description: Do every act of your life as though it were the very last act of your life. - Marcus Aurelius

name: John Lennon Quote
description: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans. - John Lennon
